content.rendered: We are the leading Italian company in the production and sales of finished and semi-finished ophthalmic lenses. Ours is a “vision together” approach, conveying both the completeness of what we offer and an affinity with the needs of our customers. What we offer goes beyond technology, sales or the product itself, because it originates in and is developed from the relationship we build with our customers. A way that has resulted in well over 20 million pieces a year, sold all over the world. Not just personalised logistics solutions, but also total product personalisation, marketing support and a system integrator service.
